section.title:
bills of materials
copying of Copy Bill of Materials
section.para: To make a copy of a bill of materials (BOM), go to Products > Bill of Materials > Copy. The following screen will appear:
When copying a BOM, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter the item number of the manufactured item whose BOM you want to copy.
Displays inventory UOM automatically when item number is entered into Item Number field. The item description will also appear.
Enter the item number of the manufactured item whose BOM you wish to create by this copy.
Displays inventory UOM automatically when item number is entered into Item Number field. The item description will also appear.
